settings.name: CRUSADE
settings.feature_description1:
with flap closure including:
- RFID zipped pocket for passport and credit card protection.
- 2 large inner pockets to store charger, power bank and small accessories,
- a key chain made of a 3-tone rope and metal hook.
settings.feature_description2:
in the
front offering an extra security loop to
insert the puller after closing, ideal size
pocket to store smaller items.
settings.feature_description3:
hardware: puller, front metal buckle,
rope stopper, strap buckle.
settings.feature_heading4: Adjustable ribbed foam straps for optimal comfort
settings.feature_description5:
The outer and inner fabrics used for this collection are recycled and use 2 different recycling techniques. These fabrics are durable and do not compromise on Hedgren quality.
The main material is 100% recycled nylon, made from fiber waste collected during yarn spinning. This fabric has the same satin and deep colour rendering as our iconic fabric and is water repellent.
A combined high-density polyester material is used at the bottom of the bags to give additional protection and resistance to our products. This fabric is 100% recycled polyester (RPET), made from recycled plastic bottles.

settings.name: CANYON
settings.feature_description1:
- Main compartment provides space for larger items and storage organization for charger, power bank and small accessories.
- RFID zipped pocket for passport and credit card protection.
- Dedicated foamed back compartment for 15.6’’ laptop.
settings.feature_description2: are covered by a fabric flap providing extra protection, especially against the rain.
settings.feature_description3:
closed by
a trendy 3 tone rope and a flap, ideal

during the day trip.
settings.feature_heading4: Quick access zipped pocket in the front
settings.feature_description4:
offering an extra security loop to insert the puller after closing. Pocket with ideal size to store smaller items:
- including an inner open pocket, convenient for mobile phone,
- including a key chain made of a 3-tone rope and metal hook.
settings.feature_description5: with easy access, practical to store a bottle or an umbrella.

settings.name: QUEST
settings.feature_description1:
The outer and inner fabrics used for this collection are recycled and use 2 different recycling techniques. These fabrics are durable and do not compromise on Hedgren quality.
The main material is 100% recycled nylon, made from fiber waste collected during yarn spinning. This fabric has the same satin and deep colour rendering as our iconic fabric and is water repellent.
A combined high-density polyester material is used at the bottom of the bags to give additional protection and resistance to our products. This fabric is 100% recycled polyester (RPET), made from recycled plastic bottles.
settings.feature_description2: Including an RFID zipped pocket for passport and credit card protection, 1 open pocket to store a mobile phone or small accessories, a ket chain made of a 3-tone rope and metal hook.
settings.feature_description3: Practical large front pocket closed by a trendy 3-tone rope and a flap.
settings.feature_description4: Quick access to zipped pocket in the back offering an extra security loop to insert the puller after closing. Ideal pocket to store a mobile phone, ID document and more.
settings.feature_description5: Iconic, qualitative Hedgren branded hardware: puller, front metal buckle, rope stopper, strap buckle.
settings.feature_description6: The main compartment zipper is covered by a fabric flap providing extra protection, especially against the rain.

A combined high-density polyester material is used at the bottom of the bags to give additional protection and resistance to our products. This fabric is 100% recycled polyester (RPET), made from recycled plastic bottles.
